entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.6°C

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023
